text: 2|73|dau che  neah yeung ban banhchea tha  chaur puok anak yk phnek namuoy  nei meko nih veay towleu sakasap noh .  dauchnih der  a l laoh nung thveu aoy anak slab teangoasa rsa laengvinh( now thngai barlok)  haey a l laoh bangheanh ph so  d tang  robsa trong dl puok anak  daembi aoy puok anak  cheh kitpichearna .
